content.raw:
I got this error message `addgroup: Only one or two names allowed` while building the Docker image. Is it expected?

    Step 4/14 : RUN addgroup --gid 1000 $USER &&     adduser --uid 1000 --ingroup $USER --home /home/$USER --shell /bin/sh --disabled-password --gecos "" $USER
     ---> Running in 21e792f98685
    addgroup: Only one or two names allowed.
    The command '/bin/sh -c addgroup --gid 1000 $USER &&     adduser --uid 1000 --ingroup $USER --home /home/$USER --shell /bin/sh --disabled-password --gecos "" $USER' returned a non-zero code: 1
    Error response from daemon: No such image: vmrc_nvidia:2018_Oct_18_1051
    Built vmrc_nvidia:2018_Oct_18_1051 and tagged as vmrc_nvidia:latest
content.html:
I got this error message addgroup: Only one or two names allowed while building the Docker image. Is it expected?

Step 4/14 : RUN addgroup --gid 1000 $USER &&     adduser --uid 1000 --ingroup $USER --home /home/$USER --shell /bin/sh --disabled-password --gecos "" $USER
 ---> Running in 21e792f98685
addgroup: Only one or two names allowed.
The command '/bin/sh -c addgroup --gid 1000 $USER &&     adduser --uid 1000 --ingroup $USER --home /home/$USER --shell /bin/sh --disabled-password --gecos "" $USER' returned a non-zero code: 1
Error response from daemon: No such image: vmrc_nvidia:2018_Oct_18_1051
Built vmrc_nvidia:2018_Oct_18_1051 and tagged as vmrc_nvidia:latest
